itunes:title: CS: Chris Britton - Community Spotlight
title: CS: Chris Britton - Community Spotlight
description:
Today we are chatting with BPP community member Chris Britton. Chris is based in southwest Michigan and has had an interesting journey into photography. Today Chris photographs his own family as well as family portraits for others in his community. 

Resources:

  • Follow Chris on Instagram
  • Follow Chris on Facebook
  • Join The Beginner Photography Podcast Facebook Group!
  • Sign up for your free CloudSpot account to deliver beautiful images galleries today
